text: Orle (; in older sources also Orlje) is a settlement in central Slovenia. It lies in the hills southeast of the capital Ljubljana in the Municipality of Škofljica. The municipality is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Škofljica municipal site ==References== ==External links== *Orle on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Škofljica
title: Orle, Škofljica
